english.segment1: There are a lot of things you never say. I read between the lines. I admit at times I've been unclear. I'm coming clean. This time next year
english.segment2: They say the more you love. The less you know. And there are places we should never go. And things I should not have to know about
english.segment3: Call it in the air. Stop pretending like you care. Just take it all. Or leave it there. But just call it in the air
english.segment4: We were stuck together. Like two kids caught in a fire. We were stubborn. Or too stupid. Or too scared. To get out. So what can I say?. What can I say?. I can't think of one good reason. To get up and walk away
english.segment5: Call it in the air. Stop pretending like you care. Just take it all. Or leave it there. But just call it in the air
english.segment6: You're so in love. But can't commit
english.segment7: You're so in love. But can't commit
english.segment8: Call it in the air. Stop pretending like you care. Just take it all. Or leave it there. But just call it in the air.
